sentences.en: a palace built in a neoclassical style
sentences.cn: 新古典主义风格的宫殿

sentences.en: By 1800 nearly all new British architecture reflected the Neoclassical spirit.
sentences.cn: 不到1800年,几乎全部新的英国建筑都反映出新古代的精神.

sentences.en: Neoclassical architecture: Revival of Classical architecture during the 18 th and early 19 th centuries.
sentences.cn: 新古典建筑: 18世纪和19世纪早期的现代古典主义(以其当时所流传的名称).

sentences.en: Neoclassical equilibrium theory, which some macro economists had grown sceptical of, has also found new practitioners.
sentences.cn: 新古典主义的均衡理论(一些宏观经济学家已对该理论产生了怀疑)也找到了新的信奉者.

sentences.en: Neoclassical in design, his pieces employ a variety of richly - colored woods, geometric shapes, and intricate patterns.
sentences.cn: 新古典主义的设计, 他的作品采用了丰富的彩色树林, 各种几何形状, 以及复杂的图案.

sentences.en: The building was erected between 1798 and 1802 in the neoclassical style of the time.
sentences.cn: 该建筑建于1798至1802年间，属于当时的新古典主义建筑风格。

sentences.en: The building was in the neoclassical style of the time.
sentences.cn: 该建筑属于当时的新古典主义建筑风格。

sentences.en: The neoclassical growth literature focuses on factor accumulation as an engine of growth.
sentences.cn: 新古典的增长文学侧重于要素积累作为经济增长的发动机.

sentences.en: The neoclassical marginal productivity doctrine treats the factors of production like any commodity.
sentences.cn: 新古典边际生产率理论把生产要素同任何商品一样对待.

sentences.en: The whole paraphernalia of contemporary neoclassical economics seems to have become suddenly obsolete.
sentences.cn: 当代新古典经济学的全部工具似乎突然变得过时了.

sentences.en: Topics include neoclassical and new growth theory, consumption and saving behavior, investment, and unemployment.
sentences.cn: 主题包括了新古典主义与新的成长理论 、 消费与储蓄行为 、 投资和失业.

trans.tran_en: neoclassical art or architecture copies the style of ancient Greece or Rome
